ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Naeeldar, Personally, Im getting tired of your posts on this topic.  Every one of them says the same thing: low and mid levels aren t worthy to lick high
ygData.messageBody:
Naeeldar,
Personally, Im getting tired of your posts on this topic. Every one of
them says the same thing: low and mid levels aren't worthy to lick high
level's boots, high levels are the Gods, and should be treated as such (my
loose, but, i think, accurate interpretation of your posts here). You're
high level, live with the consequenses. No one promised you endless
excitement, perfect hunting zones, and new territories at level 50. You
knew, pretty much from the start, that level 50 was the pinnacle. You've
reached the end (well maybe not the end, but more like a pause, until the
expansion comes out) of your journey in EQ. Why not do a little bit of
exploring now? Im sure you haven't seen ALL of Norrath. Why, the last few
days have been quite enjoyable for me, hiding out in Runnyeye, exploring
the parts of it (still going in invis tho) that I was too afraid to see
when I was of "proper" level to hunt there. Found a merchant (wouldn't
sell to me, go figure), a banker (killed one before I thought to try and
actually "bank" there!-- it works!), a really nifty Slime Elemental that
was a little tricky to get to at first, and a gelatinous cube that I have
yet to find, as well as some underwater passageways that I still have yet
to explore. Also, try trade skills, or doing some RP events for your
guild, or just enjoying the company of the friends you have made in EQ.
Oh, and another thing: puh-lease trim your messages to the smallest amount
of quoting possible. Its only good netiquette.
Can we have a plonk or kabong or something on this thread here?

/piss and vinegar mode off

Elwe Lay
36 Songs (just last night-- yeah!)
Bard of the Kinship of Valor
Karana Server
Still feedbacking the Surfing Nerf every day...

--------------------
Message: 12
Date: Mon, 24 Jan 2000 21:04:43 -0500
From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
Subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant

Heh that was 2 months ago roughly I guess when he stated that the majority
had a 30-40 level char. By now it's easily up to 35-45 probably higher. So
no your wrong and again their aren't problems at mid level you just want
something to be added for it for the hell of it we don't we want it to be
less crowded and able to hunt in zones.

Naeeldar
-------------------
